p: The addition of sage decreased the amount of tocopherols in evening primrose seed oil ( Figure 1H), in comparison to control oil without additives. The addition of basil generally increased the content of tocopherols. Thyme had no effect on the level of tocopherols, with the exception of 50 g of intact thyme plants (IP), which caused a statistically significant increase in tocopherol levels ( Figure 1H).
